name: Deep Rock Galactic - Supporter Upgrade
detailed_description:
Update - February 2019!

As part of our ONE YEAR CELEBRATION and to thank all our wonderful supporters, we've added a load of new treats to this package. What a year. Here's to many more to come. :D


About the Game

So you like Deep Rock Galactic, but it’s just not enough? You want more? Well, then the Supporter Upgrade is for you! Help fuel further development of the game, while getting your grubby mining-gloves on this tasty bag of exclusive treats:

  • NEW: Supporter-only gold-plated skins for all weapons in the game!
  • NEW: VIP treatment at the ingame Abyss Bar - Get the SUPPORTER EDITION of the tasty Glyphid Slammer for your whole team, served in the gaudiest of golden tankards!
  • NEW: A unique Ghost Ship Games themed helmet, marking you as a permanent member of the Skeleton Crew!
  • NEW: Your chat name will be gold, to show off your Supporter status!
  • The unique Supporter Badge, shown next to your name ingame! (NEW: And in chat!)
  • An exclusive set of blinged-out armor for each class!
  • Our heartfelt and eternal thanks and gratitude <3

Important note: By buying this DLC you are first and foremost showing your support for the game and for us, the developers. The bling-bling in the list above is really just icing on the cake!

  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5770 /w 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
